items.content_html: # prorate-invoice-calculator A lightweight JavaScript library for calculating prorated subscription invoices. Given a billing cycle and a set of usage intervals (with start/end dates and monthly rates), it returns daily-prorated costs per plan segment and a total invoice amount‚Äîperfect for usage-based billing and subscription services.
items.title: HARRIFIED/prorate-invoice-calculator: # prorate-invoice-calculator  A lightweight JavaScript library for calculating prorated subscription invoices.   Given a billing cycle and a set of usage intervals (with start/end dates and monthly rates), it returns daily-prorated costs per plan segment and a total invoice amount‚Äîperfect for usage-based billing and subscription services.
